name: pluralsight-light-gray-syntax

0.1.0.name: pluralsight-light-gray-syntax
0.1.0.description: A syntax theme which uses Pluralsight's recommended color palette on a light gray background.

readme:
# pluralsight-light-gray-syntax-theme
A syntax theme with a light gray background, intended to help authors add syntax highlighting to slides.

## Requirements & Installation
- Requires the Atom text editor: https://atom.io/
